title: SAM4UDASS: When SAM Meets Unsupervised Domain Adaptive Semantic Segmentation in Intelligent Vehicles. (arXiv:2401.08604v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Semantic segmentation plays a critical role in enabling intelligent vehicles to comprehend their surrounding environments. However, deep learning-based methods usually perform poorly in domain shift scenarios due to the lack of labeled data for training. Unsupervised domain adaptation (UDA) techniques have emerged to bridge the gap across different driving scenes and enhance model performance on unlabeled target environments. Although self-training UDA methods have achieved state-of-the-art results, the challenge of generating precise pseudo-labels persists. These pseudo-labels tend to favor majority classes, consequently sacrificing the performance of rare classes or small objects like traffic lights and signs. translated_title: 当SAM遇见无监督领域自适应语义分割在智能车辆中
translated_abstract: 语义分割在使智能车辆理解其周围环境方面发挥着关键作用。然而，基于深度学习的方法通常在领域转移场景中表现不佳，原因是缺乏用于训练的标记数据。无监督领域自适应（UDA）技术已经出现，以弥合不同驾驶场景之间的差距，提高无标注目标环境上的模型性能。尽管自训练UDA方法已经取得了最先进的结果，但精确伪标签的生成仍然是一个挑战。这些伪标签往往偏向于多数类别，从而牺牲了罕见类别或类似交通灯和标志等小物体的性能。为了解决这个挑战，我们介绍了SAM4UDASS，一种将Segment Anything Model（SAM）结合到自训练UDA方法中以提升伪标签的新方法。它涉及语义引导的蒙版标签，通过给无标签的SAM蒙版分配语义标签来细化伪标签。
tldr: SAM4UDASS是一种在自训练无监督领域自适应语义分割方法中使用Segment Anything Model（SAM）的新方法，旨在解决生成精确伪标签的挑战。
